Mobileer Song Editor

Using the Song Editor

A Song is a Standard MIDI File containing note information, instrument selections, and other performance data. The primary purpose of the Song Editor is to preview songs as they will sound on the Mobileer Synthesizer, and to optimize them so that they sound good if the number of voices is limited.

You can use the Song Editor to:

  • preview songs on the current orchestra,
  • solo channels to hear instruments in isolation
  • set the max Voices for the Synthesizer to simulate target systems
  • set Scaleable Polyphony MIPS values for each channel to determine what instruments will play when polyphony is limited
  • save a new MIDI file with a Scaleable Polyphony MIPS System Exclusive message

To select the Song Editor, click on the third tab.
